Question: How many customers do we have?
How. many products do we have?
print the name of the customer along with ID with the most sales order amount
SQLQuery:
SELECT Top 1 c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.LastName
FROM SalesLT.Customer c
JOIN SalesLT.SalesOrderHeader soh ON c.CustomerID = soh.CustomerID
JOIN SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail sod ON soh.SalesOrderID = sod.SalesOrderID
GROUP BY c.CustomerID, c.FirstName, c.LastName
ORDER BY SUM(sod.LineTotal)  DESC

Question: Which product Model was the fifth most ordered
SQLQuery:
with cte as
(
SELECT m.ProductModelID, m.Name,
sum(OrderQty)  TotalOrder,
Dense_Rank() over(Order by sum(OrderQty) DESC) as Order_Rank
FROM SalesLT.ProductModel m
JOIN SalesLT.Product p on p.ProductModelID = m.ProductModelID
JOIN SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail sod
on p.ProductID=sod.ProductID

GROUP BY m.ProductModelID, m.Name 
)

select Name, ProductModelID from cte where Order_Rank=5

Question: export 10 customers to excel
SQLQuery: select top 10 FirstName, LastName from SalesLT.Customer
